thread.section_title: Auto Lenders Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Auto Lenders | autolenders.com
thread.title: Trish Kaczor
thread.title_full: Auto Lenders reviewed by Trish Kaczor

author: Trish Kaczor
title: Trish Kaczor
text:
I purchased My "DREAM" CAR from Auto Lenders this past weekend, it was not at all planned. I have been without a car for the past few months and it has dreadful. I was driving past auto lenders this weekend and took a quick drive through the lot, and saw a nice sonata, but did not act on it until later the day, i decided to reach out and schedule a test drive in the coming days. Long story short- auto lenders immediately responded to my inquiry and i came in that same afternoon, it was after 5 by the time i got there and they had no problem staying to help me even though they were technically closed. I test drove the sonata, i was helped by Chris Langley, whom did a Spectacular job making me feel comfortable. I am a person that is solely driven by feelings and the vibes i pick up. At auto lenders it was their utmost compassion and desire to see me attain the best car That was very important to me, never did i feel pressured or doubt the process and their authenticity. Upon returning with the sonata i realized perhaps i wanted a coupe, i told Chris i was not married to the sonata. He asked me what my dream was - i said black coupe leather sun roof back up cam low mileage under $18,000. He quickly typed some things into his laptop turned it around and had 3 black Honda accords... i picked 1 out---he pulled her up and away i went (ANOTHER IMPORTANT DETAIL WAS THEY ALLOW YOU TO TEST DRIVE THE VEHICLES YOURSELF, GIVE YOU THE PERSONAL TIME TO BOND WITH THE CAR AND BE COMFORTABLE)
I came back from my test drive and LOVED THE CAR !!! It had under 30 K mileage, all leather black interior, push to start, touch screen, back & SIDE CAM, heated seats, sunroof, fin, led lights, THE FULL OUT WORKS !!! Never had i been able to afford and obtain a car such as this . Auto Lenders made that POSSIBLE !!! I am so Grateful and i strongly recommend to all those out there looking for the the BEST to give auto lenders the opportunity to show you how the best work !!!
God Bless <3
